column.name: description
column.value: It describes type of the login account

column.name: description
column.value: PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2) is part of RSA Laboratories Public-Key Cryptography Standards (PKCS) series, specifically PKCS #5 v2.0, also published as Internet Engineering Task Forces RFC 2898. It replaces an earlier key derivation function, PBKDF1, which could only produce derived keys up to 160 bits long

changeSet.author: sg
changeSet.id: create indexes for hibernate_sequences and databasechangelog
changeSet.sql: CREATE CLUSTERED INDEX IX_HibernateSequence_SequenceName ON dbo.hibernate_sequences (sequence_name)
CREATE CLUSTERED INDEX IX_DATABASECHANGELOG_ID ON dbo.DATABASECHANGELOG (ID)
